what_to_watch: Panel board schedules and circuit assignments
HVAC equipment schedules — model numbers, capacities, locations
Plumbing riser diagrams — waste/vent/storm vs water/beverage
Demo plans vs proposed plans — what's being ripped out vs installed
Comcheck compliance reports for energy code
common_superintendent_questions: What panel does this circuit feed from?
Where does the roof drainage go?
What HVAC unit serves this area?
What's the plumbing rough-in for this wall?
